text: Sab milkar Allah ki rassi ko mazboot pakad lo aur tafraqe (divide) mein na pado. Allah ke us ehsan ko yaad rakkho jo usne tumpar kiya hai, tum ek dusre ke dusman thay, usne tumhare dil joad diye aur uske fazal o karam se tum bhai bhai ban gaye. Tum aag se bhare huey ek gadhe (pit) ke kinare khade thay, Allah ne tumko ussey bacha liya, is tarah Allah apni nishaniyan tumhare saamne roshan karta hai shayad ke in alamaton se tumhein apni falaah ka seedha raasta nazar aa jaye
